unnormalised: Borem, konnem tor Indiaant urgent roomant kaam korop *khorem* koxem asta mhunn sodlem. Ghott zavo, beta testers, kiteak tem sodanch tumi TV-nt polletat toxem na.
normalised: Okay, mhonnlle konni zannanim vicharlem Bharotant emergency roomant kaam korop koxem asta mhonn. Kamar kas bandhat, beta testers, kiteak tem sodanch T-V cher dista toxem nasta.

unnormalised: Poilem, ekuch bondokichi ghai gheun natki walk-ins visorat. Na, bhai. Amkam ek spectrum mellta. "Mhojem pott falea saun dukhta" mhunnchea lokan saun 2 AM-ak (hoi, khorem) khorea, imanik-deva urjent poristhitik. Ani kednaim, tum 1998 saunchea tanchi pachon sombondit somsyanchi vistrut ithias aikun 20 mintam karcher tanche bhitor differences sangunk kotthin zata. Mhoje lagim ek monis ailo kiteak tanka dista kiten torie tanka paper cut zaunk xakta. Paper cut! Tem microscopic aslem. Mhoji chai addiktion mhunnje bodli urjent poristhithi, tbh.
normalised: Poilem mhonnlle eka goá¸·li lagun vochun yetat toxem natki vochun yetat te visorat. Na, bhai. Amkam vegvegle prakar mellttat. "Maje pett dukhta kalchea disa saun" mhonnchea lokanche donparachem don vaztam (ho, khorench) asal'lea lokanchea saun khorea, satyameren aslolea emergencies meren. Ani kedna kedna fark sangop kotinn zata tumi eka hazar nauxe novad ann'ni purvoleak vochun tankam digestive issues vixim detallan aikun zalea uprant. Maka eka pausache chiroko lagla mhonn eka munxan ailem. Pausache chiroko! Tem microscopic aslem. Maje chai-chi aavod axil'li ek vhoddli emergency zateli, khoreponnan sangpak zata.

unnormalised: Ani magir diagnostic challenges asat. Amchem MRI machine, tachea pornea atmyak xirvad aso, "routine maintenance" kiteak mhunn bond poddunk xakta (vachat: technician tachea ganvant ek festak gela). Mhunnche, tum tumchea clinical acumen, tumchea stethoscope ani kadachit lucki guess-acher aadharit asa. Oh, ani tumchea senior resident-anchi ektron zannvai zo kadachit tanchea 36th horachea shift-acher asta. Shaky hatam sangata tem ECG interpret korunk bori luck! Falea, Dr. Sharma-n eka perfectly healthy patient-ak Stage 4 kitem torie diagnose kelem. Tem machine-ak recalibration zai aslem!
normalised: Uprant diagnostic challenges yetat. Amajem M-R-I machine, tachea purannea atmeachem borem korum, tem "routine maintenance" khatir bond asunk xakta (vachat: technician apli ganvant ek festival khatir gela). Mhonnlle, tumi tumchea clinical acumenacher, tumchea stethoscopecher, ani kiteakui tumchea naseeban nirbhor asta. Oh, ani tumchea senior residentachem ekttaim jnan tem zatat chovtees ghontteache shiftcher. Bori naseeb tumchea E-C-G khuxllea hatamni interpret korpak! Kal Doctor Sharman eka ekdom bore astolea patientak Stage char kitem tori diagnose korpache aslem. Distan aailam, machine calibration korpak zai aslem!

unnormalised: Ani paperwork vixim uloium. So. Much. Paperwork. Hem oxem asa mhunn ami ekleanuch paper industry ujevan dovortat. Tumkam sogllem document korpak zai. Dor ek khoklo, dor ek xink, dor ek questionable rash. "Patient davy korita kiten torie tachem tale dukhk 14:30 hrs-ak suru zalem. Fever nakarta. Vital signs stable-ish." Hanv devachem nanv gheun sangta, hanv rokddich patient-ak treatment divonchea bodlek hanv boriunchea kamer chodd vell karchitat. Mhojem handwriting itlen boreach kiteak tench taka emergency situation zaunk xakta.
normalised: Ani aami paperworkacher ulo maruya. Kitlem. Zait paperwork. Tem oxem asa zoxem aami eklean paper industryak thamboytat. Tumi sogllem document korunk zai. Ek ek khokli, ek ek xink, ek ek shakhy nasloli rash. "Patientachea matyecher vedna choda vaztan suru zali mhonn sangtat. Tap nakarta. Vital signs stable-ish." Hanv shapath gheun sangtam, hanv patientak treat korun zaitim borpachim kamam kortam. Maje borpache akxer itlem vaitt zalam ki tem apleak ek emergency situation zaunk xakta.

unnormalised: Pun hanga imanichem satya asa, chaos ani chronic back pain bhitor (dhanyavad, uncomfortable hospital beds!), tumhak kednaim hero mhunn dista. Tum roddi accident-acher tem bhurgeak stabilise korun (Rs. 2000 helmet-an tachem jivit vachoilam zaunk xakta), va tum silent heart attack timak melloun. Teo poristhithichi soglle porva kortat. Mhunnche, hoi, tem thoddem mathem, thoddem messi ani chodd exhausting asa, pun tem bodlen ek boreantlem borem kaam asa. Tumchem sense of humour, ek ghott bladder ani kadachit ek jivit bhor chai supply gheun ieiat. Tumkam tem zai poddtolem.
normalised: Punn hanga khorem utor, asantat ani kallichea dukhi (dhanyavad, asukol'loddache hospital bed!), kiteak hanv eka devtachea bhaxen disun yeta. Kedna tumi eka cheddvak eka rastyachem accidentant stabilize korta (don hazarche rupeachem helmet tanchem jiv bachoi yetam), vo kedna tumi eka silent heart attackak thambota. Te sangat zaitoarthache zatat. Mhonnlle ho, tem thoddem madd, thoddem messy, ani zait ravta, punn tem duniya-ntlem ekdam borem kaam mhonn zata. Tumchea hasyache jnan, eka zait udetolem bladder, ani kiteakui tumchea jivnachem chai tumkam zai zatolem. Tumkam tem lagtelem.
